FuncDef: This command specifies the number of OAM loopback attempts that must fail after the periodic attempt before the endpoint will transition to AIS-LOC state.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of failed loopback attempts before an ATM VC goes down. Values-0 to 10 (A zero value means that the endpoint will transition to AIS-LOC state immediately if the periodic loopback attempt fails.). ParamDefault: Default- 4
